title.en: Civil Law Special Seminar for Doctoral Students II

structural_units.address:
Näituse 20-318
50409 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The substance will be examined within the framework of the research topics of the faculty on various topical issues in relation to the civil law institutes. Presentations by doctoral students provide them possibilities to share their opinions, discuss and defend their main ideas and research outcomes.
description.et: Aine raames uuritakse teaduskonnas tehtava uurimistöö eri valdkonna aktuaalseid probleeme seoses tsiviilõiguse instituutidega. Doktorandid koostavad ettekanded, esitavad need oponeerimiseks kaasdoktorantidele ning diskuteerivad oma uurimistöö põhiseisukohtade üle seminaris.

objectives.en: Objective of the second-year doctoral student expected level:
objectives.et: Aine eesmärk on teise aasta doktrandilt oodataval tasemel

objectives.en: 1) upgrading skills of formulation of research problems in the field of private law
objectives.et: 1) tsiviilõiguse aktuaalsete probleemide sõnastamise kogemuste omandamine

objectives.en: 2) gaining experience in handling of contemporary private law problems in connection with the PhD thesis
3) upgrading of skills in drafting scientific legal texts
4) gaining experiences required to gather materials for the article, and the erection of a research tasks to compose text
objectives.et: 4) kogemuste omandamine iseseisvalt artikli jaoks materjalide kogumiseks, uurimisülesande püstitamiseks ja teksti koostamiseks

objectives.en: 5) to provide doctoral students with knowledge of the foundational underpinnings of civil law, while developing their abilities in presenting and defending their positions.
objectives.et: 5) suulise ettekande koostamise ja esitamise oskuste omandamine

learning_outcomes.en: The second-year doctoral candidate is expected at the level:
1) PhD student orientates in contemporary legal literature and is able to formulate a topical problems
learning_outcomes.et: 1) doktorant tunneb kaasageset õiguskirjandust ja oskab sõnastada aktuaalseid probleeme

learning_outcomes.en: 2) is able to use the resources to draw up presentation based on scientific studies
learning_outcomes.et: 2) doktorant oskab kasutada allikaid uurimustliku ettekande koostamiseks

learning_outcomes.en: 3) is able to analyze scientific texts and to formulate questions of the surface
learning_outcomes.et: 3) doktorant oskab analüüsida õigusteaduslikku teksti ning formuleerida selle pinnalt küsimusi

learning_outcomes.en: 4) is able to convincingly present their views and defend them
learning_outcomes.et: 4) doktorant oskab veenvalt esitada oma seisukohti ning neid kaitsta

learning_outcomes.en: 5) has an overview of the different research questions in the field of civil law
learning_outcomes.et: 5) doktorant omab ülevaadet erinevatest uurimisküsimustest tsiviilõiguse valdkonnas
